Documentation.long_help: Creates a geometric moment kernel. The output is a 3D vtkImageData of size KernelSize with 10 components of type double.

IntVectorProperty.name: SubSampling
IntVectorProperty.label: SubSampling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property defines the rate of subsampling used to approximate the convolution kernel elements. - If the AutoSubSampling property is true, the source find the closest value to SubSampling in order to ensure an integer subdivision of each voxel depending on kernel size (e.g if KernelSize is 23 and SubSampling is 100, the 'real' subsampling will be (int)(100/23)*23 = 92. Then each voxel will be divided in 92/23 = 4 sub-voxels. - If the AutoSubSampling property is false, each voxel is divided in 'SubSampling' sub-voxels.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoSubSampling
IntVectorProperty.label: AutoSubSampling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If 1, the voxel subsampling depends on the kernel size. If 0, each voxel is divided in 'SubSampling' subvoxels.
